knimeNode.name: String to Duration/Period
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts a string to a duration or period.

fullDescription.intro: Converts string cells to duration or period cells. The string representation of these periods or durations needs to be in the ISO-8601 representation (see period format or duration format for details).

tab.name: Column Selection
tab.option: Only the included columns will be converted.

tab.name: Replace/Append Selection
tab.option: The selected columns will be appended to the input table. The suffix of the appended columns can be provided in the text field to the right.
The selected columns will be replaced by the new columns.

tab.name: Duration/Period Selection
tab.option: If checked, the node will abort the execution and fail on errors. If unchecked, missing values will be generated instead.

ports.outPort: Output table with duration or period columns.
